page.title: 06OUTDOOR SPORTS CLUB
page.content: Berkswell and Balsall Common Sports Club is situated in Meeting House Lane, Balsall Common. It is administered by Trustees for the Lant bequest which left money to purchase land to be used for sports facilities for people in this area. It has a tennis club which plays all year. The facilities for tennis consist of five hard tennis courts of which three are all weather courts. Coaching is availabe at all levels for both seniors and juniors and various league teams exist --- two ladies teams, three mens teams and also junior teams. During the Winter there are both junior and senior soccer teams, and in the summer there are junior and senior cricket teams, all playing in various league competitions. In the club house are changing rooms, a bar and a lounge where members can relax.
